summary: EHAUST ' BRACKETS ATTACHING THE EXHAUST PIPES TO CAB HAVE RUBBER BUSHINGS THAT DISINTEGRATE QUICKLY, WITHIN A COUPLE OF MONTHS LEAVING THE PIPES HANGING WITH POSSIBILITY OF FALLING INTO THE ROADWAYS AND CAUSING ACCIDENTS.  PART NUMBER: M11-1917-004.  ON NEW (2018) VEHICLES THEY HAVE BEEN CHANGED MORE THAN ONCE.  SEVERAL VEHICLES IN FLEET WITH SAME ISSUE.
